system.description: You can apply Styles and other Command Actions to [Closed Heart] creatures normally, even if they are in @Affliction[hyper-mode]. This Perk's PP cost is made in addition to the normal cost of a Style and/or Command Action and only applies when the target is in @Affliction[hyper-mode].
